p: The results of the MTT test suggest that the essential oil produced a significant ( p < 0.05) antiproliferative effect at concentrations of 0.06%, 0.125% and 0.25% on the CHO-K1 cell line with relative cell proliferation percentage values of 87.38%, 83.36% and 69.78% respectively (Fig. 1), while its effect on the fibroblast cell line did not significant ( p > 0.05) in comparison with the control.
